EmailTemplate.subject: Your link to the report "Changing the Channel" by Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Download Your Free Report from Pivotal Labs <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Whitepaper-Media-Changing-the-Channel-Q114.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in the report "Changing the Channel: Are You Ready for Next-Generation TV?" by Pivotal Labs.
Please click here to access the paper <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Whitepaper-Media-Changing-the-Channel-Q114.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
